scripts.all: npm run typedoc && npm run lint && npm run build && npm test
scripts.typedoc: typedoc --module es5 --target es5 --includeDeclarations --excludeExternals --readme docs_index.md --name "TypeScript definitions for WebDriverIO" --mode file --out typedoc index.d.ts typings/index.d.ts lib/webdriverio.d.ts
